Header.title: Center of Excellence for ROBOTICS, ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE & BLOCKCHAIN
Header.paragraph: At the Nexus of Ingenuity and Innovation, Where Robots Reign Supreme! Explore groundbreaking research, drive transformative projects, harness unparalleled GPU resources, and navigate the future with expert guidance and assistance. From pioneering development to strategic product-level marketing and refinement, we're your compass in the realm of Robotics, Artificial Intelligence, and Blockchain.

About.paragraph:
At the Center of Excellence for Robotics, Artificial Intelligence, and Blockchain (CRAIB), we spearhead research and pioneering training programs on a global scale. Our mission is to cultivate a new generation of talent, equipping students, researchers, industry professionals, academia, and entrepreneurs with critical analysis skills, creative thinking, and an entrepreneurial mindset in the dynamic fields of robotics, artificial intelligence, and blockchain. 
 
 Driven by excellence, CRAIB provides state-of-the-art facilities that serve as incubation centers, fostering the development of patentable research and the commercialization of innovative products. Our ultimate goal is to position Pakistan as a competitive force on the global stage by leading advancements in robotics, artificial intelligence, and blockchain. Through our comprehensive approach, we aim to not only develop cutting-edge solutions but also to effectively and profitably leverage our human resources and services, making a lasting impact across borders.

Services.name: Workshop and Training
Services.text: Unlock Your Potential: Engage in tailored workshops and immersive training sessions. Master new tools and critical skills to thrive in a rapidly evolving landscape.

Services.name: Robot Designing
Services.text: Innovate Creatively: Join us on a journey of creativity and innovation in robot design. Our experts guide you from concept to realization, ensuring every step is a success.

Services.name: 3D Printing and Prototyping
Services.text: From Vision to Reality: Utilize our cutting-edge 3D printing and prototyping services to bring your ideas to life. From rapid prototyping to intricate designs, we provide the tools and expertise for your success.

Services.name: AI and Robotics Courses
Services.text: Empowering Learning: Dive into the forefront of AI and robotics with our comprehensive courses. Blend theory with hands-on practice to tackle complex challenges in these dynamic fields.

Services.name: Research and Development
Services.text: Driving Innovation: Partner with us to drive innovation and spearhead breakthroughs. From exploration to refinement, we fuel your quest for excellence in research and development.

Services.name: Guidance and Assistance
Services.text: Expert Support: Navigate the complexities of AI, robotics, and beyond with our expert guidance and assistance. Whether you're a novice or a seasoned professional, our team is here to support you every step of the way.

Features.title: Cutting-Edge Research
Features.text: The lab engages in groundbreaking research at the forefront of Robotics, Artificial Intelligence, and Blockchain technologies, fostering innovation and pushing boundaries.

Features.title: Transformative Projects
Features.text: It drives transformative projects, indicating a focus on practical applications and solutions, rather than theoretical work alone.

Features.title: Access to GPU Resources
Features.text: The lab offers unparalleled access to GPU resources, essential for high-performance computing tasks in fields like machine learning, deep learning, and data processing.

Features.title: Expert Consultation
Features.text: It provides expert guidance and assistance, suggesting a supportive environment where researchers and developers can receive mentorship and support to navigate complex challenges and maximize their impact.

Robots.name: Pepper
Robots.text: Pepper is a humanoid robot designed to interact with humans. It can recognize faces and basic human emotions, and engage in conversations. Pepper is often used in customer service and educational settings.

Robots.name: 3D Manipluator
Robots.text: A 3D manipulator is a robotic arm with multiple joints and end-effectors that can move in three-dimensional space. It is often used in manufacturing, assembly, and research applications.

Robots.name: Miro-E Robot
Robots.text: A miro-E robot is a small, agile robot designed for precision tasks. It can navigate tight spaces, manipulate small objects, and perform delicate operations. Micro-E robots are often used in medical, industrial, and research applications.

Robots.name: Turtlebot
Robots.text: A Turtlebot is a mobile robot platform designed for research and education. It can navigate indoor environments, map its surroundings, and interact with objects. Turtlebots are often used in robotics labs, universities, and research institutions.

Robots.name: Ozobot
Robots.text: Ozobot is a small, programmable robot designed for education and entertainment. It can follow lines, detect colors, and perform simple tasks. Ozobots are often used in schools, coding clubs, and STEM programs to teach programming and robotics concepts.

Projects.title: Solar Plates Clearning Robot
Projects.text: This robot can clean the solar plates with the aim to save the human time and can be controlled from a mobile phone app

Projects.title: Vision-based Prosthetic Arm
Projects.text: Vision-based prosthetic arm uses the OpenCV algorthm to detect the hand and fingers movement to manipulate the hand with the help of servo motors.
Projects.supervisor: Engr. Bilal Ahmed and Engr. Abdul Rasheed

Projects.title: Robotic Arm
Projects.text: An affordable model of a 3D manipulator developled as a semestrer project by the computer science students.

Projects.title: 3D Spyder
Projects.text: A 3D spider robot is a multi-legged robot designed to move in complex environments. It can climb walls, traverse rough terrain, and perform tasks that traditional wheeled robots cannot. 3D spider robots are often used in search and rescue, exploration, and military applications.
